title: Apple Memorial Day sales 2021: AirPods, Apple Watch, iPads, MacBook and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: See the top deals from the Apple Memorial Day sales event
article: Memorial Day sales are in full force, and if you're looking to snag a deal on one of Apple's best-selling devices, then you're in luck. We've rounded up all the best Apple Memorial Day sales, including AirPods, the Apple Watch, iPads, the powerful MacBook Pro, and more.

Apple products are always best-sellers during the Memorial Day sales event with rare price cuts on top-selling devices from retailers like Amazon, Best Buy, Walmart, and more. Today's top offers include the AirPods Pro in stock and marked down to $197 (was $249), a massive $70 discount on the Apple Watch 6, and the powerful MacBook Pro M1 on sale for $1,099 - $100 cheaper than last week's price. You can also find the all-new AirPods Max on sale for a record-low price of $518 (was $549). If you're interested in iPad deals, you can get the 10.2-inch iPad on sale at an all-time low price of $299 and snag a decent $50 discount on all-new iPad Air. See more of the top deals from the Apple Memorial Day sale, and keep in mind that some offers will end today, so if you see a price, you like, we recommend taking advantage now before it's too late.
See more of the best cheap Apple Watch deals and the best AirPods sales and deals. You can also see more of the best Memorial Day laptop sales and the top deals from the Best Buy Memorial Day sale.
